newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Align-Rite rating raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Align-Rite rating raised.

text.p: --EVEREN Securities Inc said Friday it raised its six-month intermediate rating on Align-Rite International Inc to outperform from market performer on valuation and continued strong fundamentals.

--Demand for photomasks by semiconductor manufacturers remains solid and has not been materially affected by the slowdown in the PC industry or by the excess DRAM inventory in the marketplace, EVEREN analyst Robert Helf noted in a report.
